artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Hayashiya Shōgorō; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: red artist's toshidama seal; censor seals: 村田 {Murata}, 米良 {Mera}; carver's seal: 堀竹 {hori Take}; publisher's seal: 庄 {Shō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Kotoba no hana momiji no yozakari 詞花紅成盛, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1849, 8th month.
title: Actors Nakamura Utaemon IV as Honjōmaru Tsunagorō (R) and Bandō Shuka I as Ofusa's younger sister Koito (L)
